org.openremote.entities.panel.version1

Class ButtonWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openremote.entities.panel.ResourceConsumerImpl
      • org.openremote.entities.panel.version1.Widget
        • org.openremote.entities.panel.version1.ButtonWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandWidget, NotifyPropertyChanged, ResourceConsumer

    public class ButtonWidget
extends Widget
implements CommandWidget
    Button widget that sends a command on press (behaves differently depending on the ButtonWidget.Type); simply change state to trigger the send behaviour. TODO: Implement long press command functionality
    • = Send short press command once as soon as state changes to
    • = Send short press command repeatedly as soon as state changes to repeat period is determined by
    • = Send long press command once after state has been set to for longer than
    • = Send long press command repeatedly after state has been set to for longer than repeat period is determined by
    • = Send short press command once as soon as state changes to then send long press command after state has been set to for longer than
    Author:
    Richard Turner
